solution_line_template: His income tax is {tax_percent_num}% of {weekly_income} which is {weekly_income}*{tax_percent_num}% = $<<{weekly_income}*{tax_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={income_tax}>>{income_tax}.
His tithe costs {tithe_percent_num}% of ${weekly_income} which is {weekly_income}*{tithe_percent_num}% = $<<{weekly_income}*{tithe_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={tithe}>>{tithe}.
